title: The Covert Rabbi
overview: A film that traces one of the big question marks that arises from the activities of the Shuvu Banim community.  In one of the fascinating and controversial communities that grew up in Jerusalem under the leadership of Rabbi Eliezer Berland hides a heavy cloud. Eliezer Berland, the leader of the Shuvu Banim community that broke into the public consciousness following his conviction for sexual offenses, operated modesty guards for years, whose men were arrested after being suspected of burning bus stops, beating unmarried couples walking around public parks and hitting Arab homes in the Old City. Did the modesty guards go further? Is there a connection between the modesty guards and the case of Nissim Sheetrit, an ultra-Orthodox boy who is still considered missing, and in the case of the late Avi Edri who was a yeshiva principal in Jerusalem and whose body was found lying in a forest in the Jerusalem mountains after being severely abused?
tagline: The Story of the Shuvu Banim Community

title: Suspect No. 1 Returns
overview: A homicide occurred in a community in a certain city. A woman with no injuries on her body died in her bedroom. Everyone was at risk for a while. Captain Liu of the Interpol team investigated the case, and gradually all the people involved in the case surfaced. A husband who is busy with his career and rarely returns home; a weak and cute daughter who is studying abroad; a cousin who is ambitious and vainly trying to be a high-ranking cousin; a driver with a sleek and innocent face, and a mysterious female suspect in the driver's mouth.

title: Scruff: A Tale of Undesirable Men
overview: Butch and Chatters are caught in the middle of a war between the McGee and Mcnaught gang. They have been tasked to end this war by killing Paddie "Patches" McGee but will Butch and Chatter's clash of beliefs put them in danger?
tagline: Some men just can't be redeemed!

title: All In: The Family
overview: After Michael Washington is found dead in the streets, his brother and unfaithful widow hunt for answers, revenge, and redemption through their crime-ridden urban neighborhood. What will win out? Faith and family? Or lies and betrayal?

title: days of not
overview: A former hitman and a thief on the run find themselves in a showdown in an abandoned building

title: The Garage
overview: A summer job changes everything for a young man in Indiana.

title: Murder My Darling
overview: A man in a troubled relationship with his wife finds himself in a race against time after he unknowingly hires a counterfeit mercenary.

title: Any Last Words
overview: A crook trying to flee town is paid an untimely visit by some of his former colleagues. What would you say to save your life if you were staring down the barrel of a gun?

title: if you find this guy... please kill him
overview: A director begins to be persecuted.

title: All That Glitters
overview: A reserved student gets thrown into the mysterious drug culture hidden beneath his high school.

title: Into the Yellow Distance
overview: A young 20 year old hitman by the name of Spiral, working for the mafia in the year 1965. He takes a job that later reveals disturbing discoveries about the people he truly cares about.
tagline: He was born to do this

title: Serra das Almas
overview: In Pernambuco, a jewel robbery brings together an old group of misfits, with catastrophic results. Watched over by ghosts from the past, each of them will have to find their own way to freedom.

title: The Tiny War
overview: A young hero must save his hometown from forces far bigger than him.
tagline: In smalltown, no one can hear you fight.

title: Abused by Mum: The Ruby Franke Scandal
overview: Ruby Franke's rise as a "momfluencer" with millions of followers hid a nightmare; when her son fled and alerted a neighbor about the abuse, police raided her home, rescuing her children.

title: Breached: A chronicle of cargo theft
overview: Freight train robberies grabbed headlines in late 2021. Amidst a supply chain crisis, stark images of train tracks strewn with Amazon packages went viral. Consumers, awaiting delayed orders, spotted their items among the sea of cardboard. To reassure anxious shoppers, California’s governor joined the cleanup, while rail companies spent millions on added security.  Breached asks: What makes container freight so sacred yet so vulnerable?  The story is told from the POV of a local worker, drawn from his diary. His alienated existence unravels when he witnesses the robbers in action. A hidden landscape of logistics, infrastructure, and surveillance snaps into focus, both violent and fragile. The turning point comes when he trains himself to read the landscape like a looter, discovering a way to channel his disaffection into a strike against capitalist ideology.
tagline: A diary of modern-day train robbery in Los Angeles.

title: Teach Him to Fish
overview: Tommy, a former music producer, is going through a complicated period in his life because he has just lost his job and his girlfriend. On his way to a date, he is held up by a young delinquent. They don't know it yet, but this meeting will change both of their lives.

title: Hinckley
overview: In March 1981, inspired by a dangerous obsession with the film Taxi Driver and actress Jodie Foster, a man named John Hinckley tried to assassinate President Ronald Reagan. The attack shocked the world and forever changed American history. Found not guilty by reason of insanity, Hinckley spent thirty-five years in a psychiatric hospital. Nearly 40 years later, a judge granted him his unconditional release.  HINCKLEY presents an unsparing profile of a man whose shocking act of political violence forever changed a nation and still resonates today. It examines Hinckley's troubled early life, his obsessions and other attempts at assassination, the leadup and aftermath of his attack on Reagan, and whether or not redemption is possible for one of America's most infamous men, especially in a nation deeply divided by politics and gripped by gun violence.
tagline: Assassin. Musician. Criminal. Dreamer. Stalker. Patient. Villain. Loner. Artist. Free.

title: Visitation
overview: The past returns to Felix's life, in the guise of his old friend Olaf. Mafia leader Ivan wants his cocaine back and Felix must fight for his new life and escape his criminal past.

title: Monica's News
overview: Set in 1974 in the fictional village of Millman, Monica's News follows a nine-year-old girl who finds independence in her paper route, but ends up witnessing a tragic event.

title: Somewhere Confidential
overview: As detective Guthrie Hayward spirals through a labyrinth of vice and deceit, his unconventional allies include a loyal dingo accountant, his drug-addled siblings, and an enigmatic Mennonite with possibly mystical abilities. With danger lurking at every corner and a cryptic conspiracy pushing society to its limits, Guthrie must navigate treacherous waters to crack the case and make a clean getaway.

title: Double or Nothing
overview: Two cousins embark on a high-energy race against the clock to find $50k when the mob discover one of them has been skimming from their Gold Coast workshop.
tagline: They'll burn that bridge when they get to it.

title: Suite Killing Machines
overview: As Tony Two Toes and Douglas Supreme, two hit men, find themselves in the same hotel suite the night before they are hired by the same company to kill a senator, they discover that their lives crossed as children.

title: The Joy of God
overview: The era of the zombie apocalypse is coming to an end, but Joy's younger brother, Hyun-woo, cannot be cured even with the vaccine. In desperation, Joy captures living people to feed her brother, but the situation does not improve, and they are running out of people to feed him. Seeking answers, Joy heads to the church.

title: CID Ramachandran Retd SI
overview: Retired police inspector Ramachandran investigates a case of falsely accused suspects in a rural area, uncovering lies, betrayal, and the real culprit to exonerate the innocent and restore faith in justice.

title: Dead Dead Full Dead
overview: Junior police officers Balraam and Zubeida make a cute couple, but not the most diligent detectives. Called to a posh apartment tower to investigate a reported murder, the seemingly straightforward case quickly becomes a conundrum that would confuse even Sherlock Holmes. When the victim herself returns from the afterlife, matters become even more muddled, and soon enough the question isn’t who killed her... but who didn’t?!

title: The Disappearance of Salem
overview: Director Sameer Arif delves into the world of crime and gangs in the film "The Disappearance of Salem."

title: Agathokakological
overview: Nisha gets frequent blackmail calls from a Pvt number and she ignores it. Initially, it looks like a blackmail attempt, but things take a different turn as Nisha gets into trouble regularly. SI Ajith, has to figure out who's behind this.

title: Bullets, Brothers and Blood
overview: A diverse cast, delves into a gripping tale of mistaken identity amid a crime-ridden town.

title: Mathu Vadalara 2
overview: Babu and Yesu, former delivery agents, embark on a thrilling mission as special agents, facing extraordinary challenges with humor, surprises, and nonstop excitement.

title: The Bread Thief (a short film)
overview: A regular guy gets influenced by his weird friends to rob a bakery..

title: The Murder That Changed Britain
overview: Documentary looking at one of the most high-profile miscarriages of justice in British legal history. Colin Stagg was wrongly charged with the murder of Rachel Nickell in 1992, it would take 14 years for the real culprit to be caught.

title: Jiwa 8 Belas
overview: A couple goes through a harrowing experience when they are kidnapped by a group of human trafficking gangsters.

title: Catching a Serial Killer: Sam Little
overview: In this compelling two-hour special, investigative journalist Beth Karas follows Sam Little, America's most prolific serial killer who confessed to murdering over 90 women in 17 states, in hopes to identify how he got away with murder for so long.

title: Dreaming Hollywood
overview: A deranged ex-con seeks revenge when he discovers that his screenplay has been stolen.

title: A Crowbar Christmas
overview: It's Christmas and two thugs have the perfect plan for a house robbery but a child who was left home alone seems to be the twist in their britches.
tagline: YOU BRING A CROWBAR TO A ROBBERY...

title: "GRADUATION"
overview: Student drug-dealer, Jordan, spends his time dealing legal highs to the residents of his University campus.

title: The Righteous
overview: Luis, a private tutor, is invited to a family dinner at the fancy house where he works. What starts as a peaceful evening is soon overshadowed by the conflicts within this dysfunctional family. After a power outage, five masked youths break into the house instilling panic in the place. Luis tries to protect the family, but he quickly finds himself threatened by James, the most violent of the assailants, whose hidden motivations will challenge our understanding of justice.

title: Blink
overview: PARANOIA. FEAR. GUILT.  A man returns to his seedy apartment in the middle of the night.

title: Dope Men: America's First Drug Cartel
overview: From ex convict turned filmmaker Seth Ferranti comes a true crime series spanning the untold history of illicit drugs in America. the Beginning with the first prohibition era drug cartel formed in the 1920's through the origins of the war on drugs.

title: Valleyheart
overview: In the middle of a blazing hot San Fernando Valley summer, Jane Francis must decide how far she is willing to go to help her small-time criminal brother Tommy out a jam with the Russian mob. Jane calls on her ex-cop former husband to get them both out of California alive or die in a brutal fashion when the mob catches up to them. Valleyheart takes the audience on a nail-biting ride through the underbelly of Los Angeles as Jane must help her small-time criminal brother escape the Russian mob.
tagline: The Devil is the Valley on a hot day…

title: Maatna Gaali
overview: Two teens stumble upon a dead body right outside their house. What happens next forms the rest of the story.
tagline: EVERYTHING IS LEGAL UNTIL YOU GET CAUGHT

title: Winds of Silence
overview: The lives of two brothers are shattered when one of them has a devastating tragedy.
tagline: A false witness will not go unpunished...

title: Zion's Ransom
overview: Two issues threaten a mother and her son: One, she has Alzheimer's and, two, he's not her son.

title: The Murder of Mountbatten: Minute by Minute
overview: The events surrounding the killing of Louis Mountbatten in August 1979, when his boat was blown up at sea by the IRA off the west coast of the Republic of Ireland. Royal insiders, local journalists and victims' family members recall the attack minute by minute, revealing how Thomas McMahon slipped onto the unguarded Shadow V at night to plant the bomb. The programme also considers Mountbatten's legacy, and how the tragic circumstances of his death never eclipsed his status as one of the most significant and influential royal family members of the 20th century.

title: The Last Sun Rays - Fury
overview: Mónica returns to her village crawling back to Luisa, the love of her live whom she betrayed. many years ago. During a night they confront their past until Luisa agrees to deal Mónica’s return with the new village bosses. However, none of them knows the high cost they must pay in order to have a new life together.

title: The Hidden Payback 2
overview: When a woman accepts the aid of her unpredictable brother to save her strip club, things quickly get out of hand as drama leads to violence.

title: Immortality
overview: Marissa Marcel was a film star. She made three movies. But none of the movies were ever released. And Marissa Marcel disappeared. Immortality is the complete trilogy of "Ambrosio", "Minsky" and "Two of Everything" with subverted scenes.
